content.detailedDescription:
I wanted you to know about this particular siting that i had (it's the only one i have ever had), because it is very unusual.  i have been watching ufo hunters, ufo files and ufo's over earth, and i have never heard anyone explain seeing what i saw.  i am now 39, and i was 22 when i had this siting.  

i was driving home on a friday or saturday night.  i only had one beer very early on in the evening and was driving my new car, so i did not want to be intoxicated and driving.  i was on herbst road in kennedy township heading home around 1:30 a.M.  i stopped at a stop sign at a bend in the road.  as i was starting out from the stop sign i saw approximately 10 perfectly round white lights in the sky in a perfect circle.  they stayed directly in front of my car in the sky in the shape of the circle, but the lights were moving most of the time.  they would all go around clockwise, then two would change places crossing over each other.  it was like they performing some type of show in the sky.  they were always perfectly spaced apart from each other.  

i was awestruck and got out of my car and stood by my door, holding onto my door (like my car was really going to protect me) because i was a little frightened.  i kept hoping someone would drive by so that i could stop them to have someone else see what i was seeing, but nobody ever did.  it was totally unclear whether these lights were on a large craft or were individual crafts.  my impression is that they were all individual because i did look for some type of outline of a larger craft, but in the pitch dark of the night could not distinguish any.

i watched these lights for about 10 minutes.  i decided to drive home and wake up my parents to show them.  i only took my eyes off of them a split second to get out of my car initially, and then to get back in.  i drove home about 5 miles per hour or slower just watching them as i drove trying not to take my eyes off of them.  these lights seemed to travel with me staying in front of my car up in the sky in my site.  my house was about 1-2 to 3/4 of a mile away from the stop sign.  as i approached my street, i had to take my eyes off the road to make the turn onto my street, and the pine trees were so tall that they were going to impair my sight of the sky until i made the bend.  as i turned, i took my eyes off the road, the pine trees were blocking the part of the sky where they were.  i looked back up as i was clearing the pine trees, but they were gone and i never saw them again.

i called a local tv station the next day and asked if they knew of anyone that i could report a ufo siting to.  they gave me a guys name and number and said he was the pittsburgh contact person.  i did call this man and reported the siting, so i know there's a record somewhere.  he said he would investigate it and call me back.  he said his initial impression was that i was witnessing a light show from several of the beams of lights like the ones that places shine when they are trying to attract business.  those types of lights have a trail to them, and are large and kind of fuzzy in the sky.  these lights were very bright and did not have any type of glow around them.  i am certain that they were not the type of lights from a light show as he described.  he called me the next day and said that he was not aware of any light shows in the area, and that he did not have any other reports of such lights.  he said he would just make a note of it in his record.  

with all of these years passing, i really don't remember the exact date or who i reported this to.  maybe you have a record of it.

at any rate, i just wanted to make sure that you knew about this siting since it is very different from all accounts that i have ever seen or heard of.  i would love to know who i gave the report to in pittsburgh.  i have even considered being hypnotised just to accurately recount the event.  it has always fascinated me.  my girlfriend, at the time, told me that her parents had seen strange lights in the sky around the time i did in kennedy township (where we all live).  i know i'm not the only one in the area to see things. 

it was really amazing and an experience i'll never forget.  if you ever have any questions, please feel free to call me.
content.summary: Approximately 10 round white lights in a circle spinning and crossing over each other.

content.detailedDescription: One sunday morning, a friend and i set out to the woods just off the castle hill overhead train station in the bronx. we were bored, so we decided to go there and hunt small game with pellet pistols. it was a bright sunny day. we ventured pretty deep into the woods, but could still hear sounds from the nearby train station and other ambient sounds from cars, dogs, etc. at one point, we stopped to notice how nice the day was and we sort of stood in one spot as we looked around for small game and talked. for some time, there had been dog nearby that was barking. in time this dog's bark became intense and sounded urgent. that's when i suggested that there must be something making the dog bark that way. at that point, the dog's bark intensified. just as we thought that maybe we should be keep our eyes open for what may be making the dog bark that way, everything froze in place. before this happened, leaves were rustling in the wind, birds were singing, and there was ambient noise coming from the distant streets. but, suddenly everything stopped. i noticed that the leave were not even moving anymore, and all sound stopped. it was almost as if someone had placed a giant cup over our area and blocked out all sound. just as i mentioned to my friend that everything seems to have stopped, it is no longer day time, we are in another location within the park and something in coming towards us from behind several tall shrubs. i was very curious to see what might come out of the bushes, but my friend was yelling at me to get out of there. he had already run to a pathway lit by orange glowing night park lights. whatever was coming through the buses was taking short steps because the steps were shuffling quickly. just before whatever it was emerged from the bushes i fired several shots from my pellet gun in its direction as i ran towards the lit path. as me and my friend stood in the pathway, whatever it was that was did not come out into the light. we taunted whatever it was to come out, but it did not. we decided that we should leave the area so we started following the path to a gate we saw in the distance. when we got to the gate, i noticed that a huge boulder was blocking the exit to the park. we did not even find it strange that in an instant it got dark, and that we were in a different area of the park. we kept walking as if everything was normal. just as i remarked about the size of the boulder, the next thing we knew, it was daylight again and we were now walking on the sidewalk of the street side with the park on the other side of a stone wall. however, again, we acted as if nothing was wrong, as if nothing had happened. we simply walked back home without discussing the matter, without discussing anything for that matter. when we arrive back to my house, my girlfriend said that if we were going to stay out all night, i should have at least called. we did not discuss the matter, although we understood then that something strange had happened. that is when we remembered everything stated above. unfortunately, we remembered nothing else.
content.summary: When the day stood still.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 3am and an ex-girlfriend and i were awake in a bedroom facing south, towards a pond, which is located behind the house (my parents' house) located in oxford, ma.  we noticed some flashing in the window shades (shades were pulled down half way in the 2 windows).  we thought it was heat lightning, so we got up to look.

i saw 3 or 4 balls of light hovering about 5 to 10 feet above the water down near a dock.  all the balls were rotating around an imaginary central point, moving clockwise (if looking down from the top).  all balls were white and were pulsating in sync from dim white to broght white.  then all the balls changed color simultaneiously to either red and then blue (or vice versa, i just cannot remember).  while they changed colors simultaneously, they continued to pulsate.  then all the balls moves in tendem away from the house moving in an easterly direction going behind trees and out of sight.  the balls rotated around the central point very slowly and the unit (all balls of light) moved away from the scene very slowly as well.

next, from some point behind some trees (but over the water)it looked like some sort of light "scanned" the trees as well as a trailer in which my grandmother was sleeping.  the reason i say "scanned" is because the pattern the light moved.  it started at the tree tops, and then moved in one direction (from right to left) and searched a lower level in the opposite derection.  it kept doing this slowly until the entire small area had been completely searched.

finally, the light from above the water (behind the trees)went out and almost immediately, a light from what must have been above the house had "scanned" the back yard in the same pattern as the woods...Back and forth, until an entire area had been searched.

then, the light went out. and it was over.

the light that scanned the area was an extremely bright, white light which i would describe as a bright powder white, with very well defined sides to the light beam, sort of like how a laser bean is a well defined beam.

there was complete silence during this whole event which was extremely odd.  no bull frogs, no tree frogs, noo breeze, nothing.

i was comletely frozen in shock because i was so scared during this.
content.summary: Pulsating balls of light over water, search lights from sky , completley silent.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on our dock in the evening. it was dark but the sky was clear. i saw a light coming from across the lake a bright clear light. planes never fly our way from the airport and i thought it looked strange. i called for my husband to come out just as he got to the dock the thing flew over the top of us. it was huge darkened the sky above looked like a triangle with three white lights on the bottom of it that did not shine out. we had to lay our heads back to see the bottom of it, no sound slow moving low in the sky headed off right over the top of the trees never picking up it's speed. it came from the northwest.
that same summer before we had seen the big ship. i was laying  in the lawn chair about 1:00 pm nice sunny day, for some reason opened my eyes and looked up and saw three small flying objects looked like hang gliders but they were all black and i saw no one flying them. they were completely silent and just above the trees.
content.summary: Flying triangle large dark flying slowly over the top of our dock.

content.detailedDescription:
The photos i have provided are not staged or doctored with the exception of exposure lighting(as experimental technique of bringing objects through their filtration and into view.) camera is a 12mp kodak with no accessories. this is not the only sighting or events to happen around me recently. it seems to be quite a hotbed of activity. i do request that if you decide to investigate this further with proper equipment, that an individual be used at first as a liaison, more or less, not to barnstorm the situation. this can be discussed in further detail upon meeting with your initial representative. i believe i also may have some evidence to prove the alien/government working in agreement theory. 
kindest regards,
rr
content.summary: Serpentine with a facial. also other multiple objects.

content.detailedDescription: This was taken at boynton canyon twisted tree monument, sedona,az.It is about 3 ft. in diameter. the camera is a 12 megapixal canon. it was not seen with the naked eye, it was on the camera picture file when she checked to see if  the picture came out that she snapped of a distant peak. i sent you the picture on your other e-mail, because i couldn't make the brouse accept the file.
content.summary: Round blue sphere with port hole windows.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on thursday, november 20, 2008. i was on lingleville hwy. (hwy. 8) headed west just pass hwy. 108.  i noticed a red/orange cirlce just above the western horizon.  all of a sudden another red/orange circle appear just beside the first one i saw.  then the first cirlce on the left disappeared.  on the right of the second circle another circle appeared.  it was the same size, color and spacing as between the first two.  this went on for a several minutes and i would guess approximately seven or eight circles appeared, but only two would be visible at one time. as i went around a small curve i notice another set of circles up and to the left of the first set of circles doing the same thing.  at first i thought they were jets alternating their afterburners or someting, but i realised it was too large of a circle to be glow of the afterburners of jets.  a few weeks ago i saw a jet above stephenville hit the afterburners and it had a tail similar to a comet.  these circles did not look anything like that.  i found a place to pull to the side of the road and when i looked back at the night sky there were gone.
content.summary: Red/orange circle that one would appear and one would disappear but two could always be seen

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed two very bright lights, really the only lights i saw in the sky.
as i left work at approx 5:30 p.M. in frazer, pa. one light was at say 12 o'clock to my left south west ( looking at digital compass in car ) & a larger light & brighter then the top light. larger by about 20% & also in brightness.The larger light was around 4 o'clock compared to the top smaller light. i saw a few planes go by but they were much dimmer & smaller, also in seconds i could see the planes move in the sky, but the two light stayed stationary all the time i was viewing them & the brightness satayed the same. in the first 10 min. i noticed above the top light to it's right was a much smaller light maybe only 10% the size of the 1st small light. this light blinked on & off around 3 or 4 times, then
vanished. i kept my eyes on the light best i could ( kicking myself for not having my camera " always have your camera with you " ) around 6 p.M.
i cam to a red light & could keep the lights in sight between a telephone poll & a wire that ran on a angle from the right poll out away to the ground. i saw a plane again lower in the sky, dimmer & smaller, fly from
left to right. in the 3 to 5 min. i was at the red light the plane moved from the left between the distance between the polls & out to the right of the poles. the brighter lights never moved. i felt the lights ( ufo )
was maybe out around the chadds ford, kennetsquare area. i turned off of rt. 113 on to rt. 30 heading west to coatesville. the two lights in about 1 min. became very dim & smaller, with in 3 min. they were gone. as i got to the braindywine hospital, i noticed a lot of cloud cover in the area.
i stopped at my fathers & looked up in to the sky i then could see some stars much dimmer then the lights i saw. i thought i couldn't see the bright lights becouse of the clouds but i could see much dimmer & mean much dimmer stars & all the time i was observing the two bright lights & planes & never saw any stars. i wonder what they were & if anyone else saw them, they were the only thing in the sky for a good 45 min.
content.summary: Two bright lights southwest from exton, pa. smaller light above, larger light below to right. smaller light blink above small light to right. 45 min. view, only light in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was working as a pizza delivery driver at the time and i was delivering my last pizza towards the south end of the island. i was driving on blakely ave ne heading south, it wasnt untill i passed blakely elementary school and came into the clearing, the road starts to curve left and  there is a hill off to the right of the road that i noticed an objects lights closer to the ground than normal. 

2. i thought it was an airplane off in the distance with its landing lights on and it appeared to be traveling towards me, this made me instantly alarmed because there isnt a runway around that area for at least 10 miles and not in the direction it was traveling in. from here i never took my eyes off it.

3. i thought the airplane was traveling towards me off in the distance as i traveled further down the road i started to realize the lights wernt really getting bigger and it became apparent that this thing was not traveling at a speed fast enough for an airplane to sustain flight. so i started to slow down and focus on the object. at first, the object had four lights shining towards me, 2 on each side just like an airplane with its landing lights on .

4. i realized that it was much closer than i had originally thought and moving in a way that was impossible to be human technology . i started to get emotional because i instantly recognized the outline of the shape when it became visible to the eye, the only thing i can come close to describing its shape is it very much resembled the mother ship from starfox from the classic nintendo 64 game and also on super smash brothers. it wasnt a 100% replica of the ship but thats the only thing i can describe it as. no other words would describe this object.

it was moving towards me from over the water and i noticed the lights actually starting to move up and down in a pattern . the outer left light would move up and the inner left light moved down, the same with the right side. the outer light moved up and the inner light moved down. i didnt know what to make of it at first because i was in complete shock. the object soon moved over the hill and then it soon began to hover directly in front of me and i could see the lights were not actually in a straight line, there were two lights in the front part and two lights in the back, the only way that it could have been possible for me to see the lights moving in an up and down pattern was that the object itself started to tilt at an axis so the rear lights were actually lower in altitude than the front lights. the front lights were on a wider scale than the rear thats why they appeared as outer lights. as i watched it slowly move over me it couldnt have been more than a hundred feet over me. i rolled down my window and stuck my head out the window because it wasnt directly in front of me any more it was directly over me, as i looked up it instantly clicked that these guys wanted to abduct me of some sort and at that point i became emotional and i called my mom to tell her what was happening from there i was on the phone with her for the rest of the experience. as i went further down the road it starts to go down a hill and is surrounded by trees on both sides it started to follow me down the road maintaining its altitude of about 100 ft the whole time. at this point the lights were still in view in the same direction i had saw them before but the object started traveling at a trajectory that was impossible to be from our time, it started to move backwards without rotating like the front of the ship was watching the front of my truck the whole time. as i drove further down the road the object was in the same position, in my front windshield for about half a mile without losing its image of the 4 lights in the same position as i first saw it.

5. at this point i was full on crying but still stable enough to describe everything to my mom as best as i could i couldnt believe what i had just witnessed and i knew there was no possible way for me to convey this information to others and not sound crazy. my mom just tried to calm me down and i knew she didnt really believe me, how would it sound if you got a call out of the blue and the first thing that person said to you was.. there is a ufo hovering over me right now!! i would automatically assume that person was delusional or drunk. so of course i didnt go around blabbing it to everyone 
i didnt dare mention it at work for a while because i didnt want everyone to think i was a nutter. it was a good job at the time, i eventually mentioned it to a coworker and the owner of the pizza shop, they reacted just as i suspected, just kinda brushed it off and sceptically agreed with me i didnt even explain its movements or it hovering over me. ufos had come up in a conversation and i said "yea ive seen a ufo, while delivering a pizza actually" and it pretty much was cut off from there. from there on ive only told this to close friends or people that are interested in that stuff because thats the only way for the person not to think you're insane... "oh you saw the starfox mothership? wow you're just that special i guess(extreme sarcasm)."

6. as it was directly in front of me towards the end of blakely av, it started to hover back over my roof so i couldnt see it out my front winshield anymore, so i put my head back out the window and looked straight up and it was  gone. no trace. vanished. i stopped the truck and looked everywhere around me and it was absolutely gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An object followed me down the road and was hovering about 100 ft over me.

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking down a old logging road below the house  heading south. i notice a red light up  in the trees that i took it to be the red beacon on top of the water tower in town. i decide to make my walk easier by getting on the rail roads tracks. to do that i had to turn west. i headed towards the light. i was very dark, but the moon was giving off enough light to make out the ruts on the road.  when i got to a familiar deer stand i headed east because i new that there was a small pine grove with no under growth, making it easier to reach the railroad tracks. i barely walked off the road about 10yd. then i notices what i thought was a police car parked in the woods. it was black on bottom. it had a red light on top, and was clear in the middle.  i can remember seeing the red glow in the interior i thought was a police radio.  i could hear that it was making sounds of static like the police radios do.  so immediately took it that it was a couple of police officers parked in the woods. i could see inside of what i then thought was a police car. i could even make out the outline of  a figure in the driver's see. i walked within arms lenghts of this vehicle. not for a second i didnt think it was a police. it was black till about the trunk hight of a police cruiser.  it had red/amber glow inside of it,about the width of a car windshield.  it had a rectangle red light on top of it about 4x8 in size.It was square/retangle at the back but came to a triangle at the top.  pyramid shape.   i paniced and said wtf and took of full speed. just as i turned i noticed a very bright amber light engulfed me.  i never looked back. at the time i have a cpl of warrants, and definetly didnt want to see a police.  especially in a dark secluded place.  after running to a safe place i took a few minutes to rationalize what i just saw. i knew one thing for certain, there was no way a car was capable of being where that object was. there is barerly access to 4x4 atv the road is awful and filles with deep mudpuddles a car could never negate. i also thought due to recent event, i have reason to believe that what i witnessed was a ufo.  i actually walked up on it arms length away.  there was now way that was a cop with the window down.. because if i could hear their radio, he could here me say wtf.. out loud and then me barrelling through the thick under growth.  i sounded like a spooked deer tearing through the brush. i was thinking at the time why arent they chasing me. everything happened so fast. one minute im looking up through the treeline following a red light, then next im 2 feet away from the red light. i can remember the  glow of the light that i thought was the interior of a car changing colors.  at first it was clear white.
then it was red then it was bright amber like the street light.  it flashed so brightly as i turned that i could not see anything. it took a second for my vision to come back and by then i had over ran the original trail i was following. while the light was clear like the interior light of a car  i could definetly se a single shape i took to be a driver.  it looked like when u look through the back  glass of a car. but ican remember only  seeing one seat. something else i can remember is that the radio never said anywords, it just made a jumbled static like sounds.  recently i took my wife to see the place where i seen the car/ufo?  i went there from the  track just to see if it was possible for a car to have been wherei saw it. that answere is no. it was at least a cpl hundred yards from the track to where i saw the strange object. at the time there was only a deer trail through there.  now there is a 4wheeler trail  giving the hunters easier access to that deer stand.  that night i new it was too dark to  get on the deer trail  so i just wanted to walk throught the young pines where i knew there was no under growth. and also like i said as soon ass i took a couple of steps off the main trial i was on, it was right there, arms lenght in front of me.  talk about close encounter.
content.summary: Dark object with red light on top.

content.detailedDescription:
Where to start =/

i only done this to let you's know that there sightings practically every week here, so yous can come and see for yourself.


but to name the best one i have seen was on the 16th of october 2008.

as some of you might know we have out own independent base & raff base
i live almost right on ross river ( near mt stuart ) on that night i was doing a normall skywatch over the sturat / harveys range area & around 8:30pm - 10pm i observed a weird looking shaped plane just over stuart, i ran to get my camera witch is a shitty $100 samsung l100.
by the time i had returned it had vanished ( at this time im running around the house trying to find it ) a min or 2 later i noticed it was heading away from me towards cranbrook ( suburb ) direction, iv got 16pics of it, but kinda look just like yellow street lights in the sky on the pics ( thats probaly why none of my mates belive me )


anyways iv been observing these things for quiet some time now but have been to scared to say anything ( you heard the storys from people mysteriously dieing ) but a few weeks ago my newspapper wrote an artical about hundreds of people in my town seeing the same yellow disc with the title ' townsville - ufo central ) it had been in sight for about 5mins after slowly heading over the h range ( millitry base is over there )



anyways i would just like to say theres lots of sightings over the last month in townsville of ufo's, and thought yous might wanna know incase you wanna come & check em out.


email me if you do come and you can come to my place to watch, big open range & view of the mountains.

there have also been numeras  sightings of the same shaped ship but with blue-red & green light (  i havent seen one tho, but always looking :) )




anways f*%k the goverment & hope we can get some answers soon. . . oh wait 1 more thing, i have had a dream that aliens were outside my window and came through my room ( but i always lock my door, so dont ask how lol ) and tryd to take me away.
and thats when i woke up.

i didnt have any scars or anything in my arms or legs so i didnt worry to much about it, but i can tell you i still remember how bloddy scared i was for the next 4days. . . 



anyways sorry for the spelling im only 18 & only completed yr6, but i'll be on this site regular if anyone wants to talk about there expiriances.



josh b
content.summary: Townsville ufos.

content.detailedDescription: Was exploring some logging roads in the beckler river area.An area where i had saw my first ufo years back.It was really clear up in these this area that night.Was watching an amazing light show of the the stars and falling stars when i spotted a particular what looked to be a star,except it was moving up down and to each side but stay in the same area in the sky.Then i started noticing some others in stange lights i thought at first they were plans flying through but they acted vary different it was really strange what went on.I saw some really strange things that night.
content.summary: Looked like a star but appeared to move up down and to each side.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping around 2 am and i heard a loud buzzing noize so i ran outside. it was pitch black except for a huge arrow shaped figure in the sky.It hovered for a while directly above me. so i called my friend and she lives on my street and heard it too so ran down to my house.She was really frightened and said i should report it to mufon. we ran inside to get a camera but when we returned it was pitch black and nothing was in the sky.
content.summary: Huge shaped like a missile. hovered around for about 3 minutes and disappered. i showed my friend and she went balistic and she said i should report it to mufon.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were night-hiking up through runyon canyon park.  it's usually so beautiful to see the city late at night.  we jumped over the fence and walked up the western trail that leads to the bench at the top.  we sat on the bench a short while and admired the city.  then on the way down, we passed what was the estate that was in the park on the east side.  we passed the tennis court and i said to my friend, "wouldn't you just freak if those old delapidated lights went on right now?"  i was feeling a bit freaked out from the darkness at this level of the canyon coming down the eastern trail.  well we went around the tennis courts and started down the trail that is the deepest darkest part of the canyon and suddenly from nowhere, a huge, blinding extraordinary white light flashed...And i noticed that i took exactly 4 steps while the light shined and could see my shadow, and the shadows of the trees and all the plants around us.  at this part of the trail there are very large eucalyptus trees.  i actually could see an owl in the tree startled and flying off.  it sounded like everything scurried away at that moment around us.  on the 4th step, we both froze in fear.  it was so bright, and seemingly all around us and extremely white.  so, we stopped, now in pitch blackness again, looking at each other with complete fear wondering "what the f@@@"? with this i told my friend, "i don't care what it was, just run!".  i took him back up there the next day to see where it was because i lived just down the road and knew the park very well..And he swore there must have been some people or cops playing tricks.  but when we went back i verified that where we were was dead center in the middle of the canyon where there is absolutely no chance of anyone with a light like that.  i can never forget it and was completely freaked out for weeks.
content.summary: Huge flash of light in runyon canyon

content.detailedDescription: We live in the flight path of the airport so i've seen countless aircraft landing.  however, this particular event occurred just after dusk.  just sitting there having a conversation i noticed a set of red tumbling lights very slowly crossing the sky.  they were slow enough to have a conversation about exactly what they were.  there are military aircraft in the area often, but nothing like this i've ever seen.  it took several minutes to cross the sky not making any noise.  i described it as tumbling red lights, while the other person there thought it looked like they were somehow rotating.  we both thought it was very strange looking and just really couldn't figure out what we were looking at during the time it was in view.  it's speed was slow and very steady and it's appearance made it very difficult to tell how far away it was.  i know almost always, as we live in a very quiet place, that any craft that is within eye-shot can usually be heard.  this appeared very large if you thought of all the red lights on one aircraft.  i believe there is no doubt we would have heard the engine of any plane.  there also seemed to be no perspective (like wings) and the movement was eerily slow and steady.
content.summary: Sitting on back patio, 2 of us, when a slow moving set of red lights seemed to tumble from east to sw across the sky just above treeline (but somewhat far away).

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were making a visit to a friend beach house in mexico beach not very far from the tyndall air force base in mexico beach florida.

since our friend had not arrived yet we laid down in the bed of my truck and were looking at the stars in the sky since the sky was completely clear (this was my lame atempt to be romantic). it was 9:50 pm. all of the sudden my wife (then girl friend)saw what we thought was a shooting star.  shot got my attention and i looked up to see it shooting across the sky going west at a very high altitude and speed (speed comparable to a shooting star).  all of a sudden what we thought was a star changed directions instantly and shot north east, it changed directions again and shot south.  it instantly shot back east and seemed to accelarate out of the sky at 5 times the speed as when we first saw it.

it basically looked like it traveled in a triangle shaped figure in the sky before it shot out of view.

     /\                    increased speed drastically here and left view
    /  \                           /
   /    \                        /
  /      \                     /
 /____<___\____<______<______/_____<____<<came into view here
           \               /
            \            /
             \         /
              \      /
               \   /
                \/ 

this entire episode happened in about 10 seconds and it covered hundreds of miles of travel in no time.

shortly after we could here several fighter jets take off tyndall afb.

my wife and i never did speak of this to anyone else for fear people would assume we were crazy...
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star shooting across sky by tyndall af base

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike down a street heading west in the town of gulfport fla.. the weather was clear and there was a large portion of open sky in front of me ,and a row of trees on my left. i saw a large cigar shaped object possibly 2  1/2 times the length of a fighter jet and maybe 20 ft tall fly over from north to south at about 200/300 miles an hour it was gray/silver in color and i dont know if it had any markings on it . it was followed by 2 military fighter jets that from what i remember were right behind it.Maybe 50 ft.Behind .I only saw this for a couple of seconds as they passed maybe an eighth of a mile in front of me,and almost directly overhead.The only sound i remember is the sound of the jet engines.This all happened so quickly i just brushed it off as military vehicles,maybe experimental.Mcdill air force base is not far from where i lived.
content.summary: Saw gray cigar shaped ufo being chased by 2 military jets.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 18 at the time and some friends and myself decided to drive to a dirt road in the middle of corn fields to the west of aurora. we specifically went to look for strange lights in the sky, not really believing we would see anything. after about a half hour we saw a light to the west at an estimated mile away from us and about 20deg above the horizon. it was rotating horizontally from left to right about its axis, and we at first thought it was some kind of tower light. we soon noticed that the light wasn't rotating in a striaght line however, it started to spin around it axis slightly rotating clockwise, untill it was now going around an object vertically. soon it was rotating all the way along the edge clockwise, like it was spinning on all three axis. the light would appear along one edge and go across its face to dissapear behind it.
 we were all perplexed as to how a light could spin in every direction and not hit the arm that was holding it if it would have been on a tower. soon, very small points of light started dropping from undernieth the object, about 15 of them. they dropped slowly about the width of a thumb under the object, and then shot off in every direction towards the ground very fast, and were soon gone from sight. still thinking this had to be some kind of manmade device, such as fireworks from a tower or such. about 10 minutes later, all the small points of light returned to the exact spot the sped off from, below the object, and slowly returned to the larger rotating object. after seeing this we were all perplexed as to what this could be, but were now sure it wasn't man made.
 as soon as the last small light had returned, the space between the edges of the rotating light seemed to get smaller, and the light dimmer as if receding into the distance, untill we could no longer see it. none of us were drinking or doing drugs that night, and i don't know what we saw, but i know at the time, no known aircraft could have accomplished what we saw. the whole event lasted about 45min to an hour.
content.summary: Rotating white light on all 3 axis with small lights dropping away and returning

content.detailedDescription: I'm a security officer. i patrol a plaza with various stores. on the time and date as stated, this is what i seen. it was around 11:45 a.M. to 12:00 p.M. during one of my patrols, i happen to see a bright light in the sky towards the west of my location. i didn't think anything of it at the time. i went on continuing to patrol the area. i position myself in a different spot about every 15 to 20 min. and scout the area of the plaza. after positioning myself in a different spot, i happen to notice that the bright light was still in the sky in the same location, the time that had past from the first sight, in the 15 to 20 min. range. this continued until i decided to take a picture of it. at this point, it's not a big deal because i'm thinking it's just a star. i mean, it wasn't moving. about 30 min. to an hour later it was gone. at 3 pm, on my lunch break, i reviewed the photo and started enlarging the photo when as everytime the photo got bigger the detail of a star was not there. the light object started to turn in the shape of a hovering disk. i then noticed small black objects around the bright light object. i then called some freinds to tell them i caught something in a photo, i sent them the photo. they told me to contact mufon. thank you for you time and please get back to me as to i would like to know what it is.
content.summary: A hovering bright white object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I had been fishing and after loading gear i was sitting on tailgate looking at sunset.I kept sitting while i had a cigar,when i noticed what i thought might be a reddish planet.It was just above the horizon in the north-northwest just to the observer's right of a very bright star.Assuming as i said it was a planet,i saw perhaps an aircraft,but the light "joined" the reddish one which got brighter for a moment then returned to its former intensity.I do not know the exact degree in the sky,but if straight above my head is 180 degrees,it was about 45 degrees above north horizon.I do not know if it was anything,but it was the darndest thing i have seen in the bayou.Also the sky is very clear and there was little if any light where i was at.It was still there when i left,but skeeter,my dog,was getting jittery for some reason so we left.I heard about you folks from my kid,so she said i should tell you.You can ask me more if you need to.Bonjour.
content.summary: 2 objects joined and are still there at this moment.

content.detailedDescription:
I am 43 this happened when i was about 7.  my family were going cross country and the event happened at night.  my dad had a plymouth and i was in the back seat in the middle.  it was night and the way the car winshield was i was able to lean my head back and look up at the sky.  it was night and i could see the stars in the sky .  as i looked up i saw a octagon shape street sign looking ufo in the sky.  at the time i didnt know what a ufo was but thought that the shape was different and wondered what it was.  it had no lights and was black  i saw no light on it at all and it was spinning very slow.  i could see the shape because the sky in the back was brighter than the object above our car.  then as i looked another one came up behinde it and connected to it.
\
now let me tell you this before zi go on.  this incident has bothered mem my whole life and i told only my children wife and mom a few weeks ago.  i also tried to contact seti for info about a stop sighn looking ufo that had no lights and they blew me off along with others.  monday i happened to be channel surfing and came across a ufo show.  i thought more crapabotu glowing ufo's.  i thought what about the one i saw then you had a segment that was exactly!!!!!!!!! what i saw.  though i didnt see like a separation of pie lights on the bottom.  now this is where my proof comes in.  i still have the email i sent out on my computer and can fax you a copy proving that this is what i saw.  i would like to know if others not only saw a octagon shape looking ufo but saw two that connected in the sky.  please contact me.



since i was a kid i dont know what city i was in when we took the trip.  i do know that there wernt many trees.  i was like a desert long strip of highway.
content.summary: Stop sign shape.

content.detailedDescription:
It was in the evening after dinner, i was in my room doing bills and making phone calls. my wife had left the house to pick our son up from ccd
class. this is over at 7:30 pm and just about 8 minutes away from our home. when she arrived back home @ approximately 7:40 pm she came running up the stairs to tell me that she had just seen the freakiest thing. so i asked her what she saw.
  my wife told me she saw this black triangle shaped craft just sitting above the gas station at the corner of huntingdon pike and rockledge avenue on her way to pick up our son. the gas station is just a 1/4 mile up rockledge avenue from our house. she very excited by the way. 
when she was telling her story. she estimated it to be just 300 or 400 feet above the station. the craft was totally still and totally silent. she also pointed out that the thing was so low that she witnessed great detail of the craft.
she was observing this event while approaching the intersection through the front windshield and then while sitting at the red light she actually
put her head out the window to listen for any noise. eventually the signal changed and she had to get our son. by the way there was regular vehicle traffic around no one else seemed to notice this craft just sitting there.  
    on the way back from getting  our son she started looking for the craft again while driving and encouraging him to do the same. the craft was no longer over the gas station on the return trip. but when she made the left turn onto rockledge ave. she spotted it again moving towards our very house and then it moved off extremely fast and disappeared.
well, you could just imagine my disbelief in this story and amazement.
so i went out side to take a look for myself with the wife and two kids on my tail.
   it was night time but a well moonlit night. we went into the back yard and investigated the sky. in just a few moments my wife yells out there it is. sure enough over the trees towards the east was this big black triangle just sitting there still and quite. it was approximately
a 1/4 mile away. it had a light at each point of the triangle and a red light in the center of the craft. after a couple of minutes it started moving very slowly to my right which would be south. it moved towards the south for some distance still in sight then it moved back to my left for some equal distance then it stopped again.
   i yelled to my son to go and get my binoculars. he did and comes back a few minutes later with a pair of his binoculars. well they are toy binoculars; i can't see any thing out of them. so i yell out these aren't 
my binocs and tell my wife to keep and eye on the triangle while i go find my 10x50 binochs. so by the time that i retrieved my binocs and get back to view the craft 5 minutes have had to pass. but low and behold the triangle is still right there still just sitting there totally still.
    so now i view this thing through the binoculars. it���s big and black
with a white light at one point , a red light at another point, and a green light at the third point. it also had a very peculiar red light that seemed to be spinning at the center of the craft. at one point the light seemed to shine into my binoculars and flash across my eyes kind of like a flash from a camera. my wife said that she saw a beam of light come out from the craft. we observed this thing for approximately 15 more minutes it was sweeping left to right and right to left all the while heading east. moving very slow and steadily. by the way there is a small farm due east of our house that is the location that the craft seemed to be hovering over.
the farm is called fox chase farm in philadelphia. it is a two minute drive by car from my home. i estimated this thing from the distance; i observed to be 300 feet long by 200 feet at the widest part of the triangle. hovering at 200 or 300 feet over the trees. but that is really anybody���s guess. i know one thing that it was real and i want to see it again.
     however i was watching your program on the discovery channel last night. you featured the sightings that have been reported in bucks county pa. i was particularly interested in the description of the ufo made by the gentlemen last night. he described a kind of craft that was kind of like a pie. that he could see through the gaps in the craft when the heat lighting was illuminating the craft. well i thought this is where the triangle came from. it looks like the black triangle could separate from that pie ship. it���s just an idea that popped into my head and it is really why i decided to tell you my story. since bucks county is the next county over from montgomery county. who knows maybe our story may help you figure this thing out.
content.summary: Black triangle over neighborhood seen hovering,moving slow , and darting fast.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: it was 7:15. i was coming out of my car. i start to see flashes in the sky, but i say "na just an airplane". then, a loud flash pops out, and an egg like figure was just standing there in the middle of the sky, i would have to say no more than 300 feet from the sky. from my garage, the object was clearly seen. then out of nowhere, the object splits in two. i stand there, looking at something no more than 1000 - 2000 feet from me. then these two objects start circling each other, each time getting closer to each other. then silence. the two objects dissapeared. all that was left was the memory.
content.summary: It just across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While walking the dogs, my wife and i noticed an extremely bright light that seemed stationary at first. we both thought we saw it move, but we weren't sure since we were walking. we stopped and watched it for a couple of seconds, but it didn't appear to move. we continued to watch it until we got home (~4 minutes), but we didn't see it move any more. the light appeared much too bright to a planet, and it was near a very bright star or planet. i commented to my wife that it definitely appeared to be within our atmosphere. it seemed close, unlike the stars, but not just because of the brightness.
my wife and i have been interested in ufos for almost two years now, and we regularly watch the skies, rarely missing a day. we are as familiar as a person could get with our night sky, and this was like nothing we had ever seen before.
the next night, though i hadn't told anyone about our experience, my dad randomly asked me if i saw a strange light in the sky. my uncle was driving in houston the same night we saw the light. he was on the phone with my dad, and was relaying to my dad that he saw what looked like a ufo come over his vehicle. he said it looked like it went over the area of the budweiser brewing plant in houston.
given that i'm submitting this five days later, i've had a chance to read a couple of similar reports and fireball sightings in the area over a period of a few days, which spanned the date of our sighting.
content.summary: Extremely bright, almost stationary light

content.detailedDescription: I let my dog out to go to the bathroom and i saw a sphere that was blinking.
content.summary: I went outside and saw a sphere that was blinking on and off.

content.detailedDescription: Our alternative education school was taking a "lantern walk" in which everyone walks with lanterns and sings songs. i cannot remember exactly how i came to notice the object, but it may have been the sound it was making. a quiet buzz or hum perhaps. when i eventually did notice the object i assumed it was a passenger plane. then i realized there were many clues all telling me it was something else. first, it was a disc. i could tell its shape because it was outlined with small lights, similar to those seen on an airplane. then i realized how low it was. it was either very low or very big which, either way, means it was not an airplane. it was also moving at a very slow, constant speed. i do not remember what i saw when it left my field of vision. it may have simply passed over some trees out of my line of sight. after it was gone, i went to a couple of my friends to see if they had seen it. they said they had, and a few days later we decided to draw a picture of what we had seen. we all agreed; we had all seen the same object. while i was watching the object i don't think i really knew what to think. i had never really thought about ufos or really the unknown in general. i will definitely not forget what i saw.
content.summary: Flying disc glides slowly overhead. two friends confirm sighting and agree on description.

content.detailedDescription: It was a night here in bucks county in january. i was at a meeting 3/4 od a mile up the road from peddlers village. just below new hope pennsylvania.The owners of the property  ( large farm)where the meeting was held had a dog that started acting up. the husband kept going out and saying something was out there. he came running in the house and up the stairs followed by 2 other guys all military from willow grove navy base stationed in willow grove. the one guy running past and up the steps said there is something out there and tempest ran off  infact ran the electric fence. this went on for a bit and i decided to leave. as i went down the driveway which runs about just less then a 1/4 mile. as i was going down the drivway i relised i did not have my headlights on. for some reason i looked to my right an noticed about 200 feet in the corner of the feild not far fron the farmhouse just below treetop level were lights, bluish and a pinkish while very small lights. i suddenly hit the breaks and turned my lights on and looked back and what ever was there was no longer. as i got to the end of driveway i got the creeps and gunned it out on the road ( 202) and headed south to go home. suddenly for about 3-5 seconds my truck started to vibrate then it was over. i continued south on 202 and comming up to peddlers village i noticed some bright lights over the feild on the left  and said to myself when the hell did they put that tower up  today. as i got closer i relised there was nothing holding it up. i drove by real slow lookking across the feild and there was what appeared two large black squares with what looked like round windows  ( short funnel like) the thing is from an angle you could not see the redish/orange glow from inside unless you looked head on into it. i sat there for what seemed like ever but prolb only 25 mins. looking at the three blueish whits lights comming out from the bottom onto the feild, and in the light where it hit the weeds it looked like daylight.. for some reason beyound me i was going to gwet out of truck and walk over to see it betterbut didnt.I sat at light where 3 other cars were watching at the light. i sat there looking back to see it again as we all were so i thought. even a car that was comming out of one of the restraunts. i must have sat through the light changing 3-4 times and noone moved so i went through the light and called the friends up the road to tell them to go check out what was down the road. they said when they got there nothing was there. the next day though the dog was found dead by driveway and was burried on property.. over the years i noticed where the object was by trees on farm the trees died just about 1/2 way down from the top... i know what i saw and know we dont have something that large as it was the size of two square barns connecter by a huge tube all solid smooth as lead black. im an artist so drawing it for someone who wants to know is no prolbem for me.I dont care what anyone says i know what i saw and it bothers me to this day. oh funny thing , this thing was in the air and did not move or make a sound at all not a peep till 2 other lights came on thats when i saw the tube connected both huge squares and got a real good look at the texture of this objest. smooth as black lead not a dent, rivet at all..Here its years later and i still find myself looking at nights hopeing to see it again. you ask what was my feelings, funny i thought im looking at something not from here and i was calm the whole time.
content.summary: Over field no sound no movement, blace, finish on object was like smooth black lead, no marks at all. lights on field.

content.detailedDescription:
I just heard about you guys. this happened 30 years ago. i was watching cartoons inside my house and my older brothers and sister were doing house chores. some one called the rest of us to come outside to see something up in the sky. when we came out all the neighbors and pedestrians (in total about 50+ people) were looking up and pointing at a silver ring hovering over the town. i saw no windows or other distinguishable features but it was clear to all of us that the ring was rotating. my brothers climbed to the top of a mango tree to get a better view. the ring moved out of sight very slow. the whole thing lasted a bit more than an hour.

when i was stationed in germany in 2002. i was on top of a ace looking at the stars with my nvg's (it was my first time using them)and noticed what appear to be a flock of birds flying very fast and sig sagging. i followed them looking at them through the nvg's and realized that the objects were flying way above the clouds. it was october or november. other thatn a few high white clouds, the sky was cleared and it was a cold night (2300 to 0000 hours). some time later i saw a dramatization of what a pilot saw over alaska or washington and that was exactly what i had seen in germany. in graffenwoehr.
content.summary: Silver ring (like a wedding ring).

content.detailedDescription:
I am 23 now and this happened when i was 9 or 10 to this day i can play these moments like a movie in my head.

 i was living in the clinton circle apartments in defiance, ohio. i was playing with my friend craig.I was playing backyard football and the game had finished up a little bit before hand so it was just me and him. it was dark so i was already late from being home and craig asked me to walk to his house with him. then it seemed like with both looked up at the same time. i was instantly terrified. i remember looking at it for about 1 min total before we ran home. i remember it was disk like in shape. the lights were flashing multicolored and wrapped around the body of the craft. i never saw it move. it hovered like a helicopter that had a silencer on it. no sound at all. i went to craig house the next morning and asked his mother at the front door if i could see him. he came to the door and i immediately started talking about the alleged ufo. he start denying it happened then reveal  that he was not allowed to talk about it or he would be in trouble and that was the end of it till now. remember i was a kid with a very big imagination so this could been over exaggerated by my mind. even so i still think about it all the time and the memory is as fresh as the day it happened.
content.summary: Ufo shaped like a disk with up to 5-6 lights around it.

content.detailedDescription: Dear sir; i was out walking my dog before putting her inside for the night like i do every night.  i observed a huge triangle shaped object flying over my house at about 9:00 pm last night, november 24, 2008.   i live at 56th and i-29 in one of the flight paths for kci airport.  i've lived there for a couple years as such i've seen jets flying in every night from 10 to 20 times a night.  this was not a jet.  it was about 2000 feet off the ground, and completely silent. white or yellow lights were on the leading edges of the triangle.  there were about 3 to 5 lights on each side in a straight line.  i watched it pass overhead slowly for about 2 minutes then it vanished or flew out of sight. i say vanished because i watched it fly away but i expected that i should have been able to watch it longer.   i reported this to the kcmo police 911 dispatcher about 10 minutes later.  it was flying directly in the direction of kci airport so  i wonder if they picked it up on radar.  i'd like to know if anyone else reported seeing the triangle last night above kansas city? i'm a former united states commissioned naval officer, and a former assistant jackson county prosecuter.   i want to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Silent dark triangular object flew at low speed about 2000 feet off the ground.
